subtitleNullable: Textile Texture Database (TILDA) for defect detection
descriptionNullable:
### Context

This is a dataset for defect detection/classification in fabric on a industrial context. It is based in the TILDA dataset for defect detection [[1]](https://lmb.informatik.uni-freiburg.de/resources/datasets/tilda.en.html)[[2]](https://universe.roboflow.com/irvin-andersen/tilda-fabric)[[3]](https://universe.roboflow.com/angelolmg/tilda-original) but the original images were resized **from 768x512 to 512x512, and then broken into 64x64 patches**, with each patch being separated into appropriate class folders.

### Content

- Image size: 64x64
- Classes: ['good', 'hole', 'objects', 'oil spot', 'thread error']
- Image count (per class): [23170, 337, 873, 636, 620]

### Acknowledgements

Based on the public dataset by the Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft's Texture analysis group from the University of Freiburg (https://lmb.informatik.uni-freiburg.de/resources/datasets/tilda.en.html)
title: TILDA 400 (64X64 patches)
